Module org.autogui

Package org.autogui.swing.util

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    PopupCategorized.CategorizedMenuItem
    the categorized menu item
    PopupCategorized.CategorizedMenuItemAction
    an action with category info.
    PopupCategorized.CategorizedMenuItemActionCheck
    an action with category info, which becomes an check-box menu item
    PopupCategorized.CategorizedMenuItemComponent
    a categorized menu item with a menu-item component.
    PopupCategorized.CategorizedMenuItemLabel
    a label: special category
    PopupExtension.PopupMenuBuilder
    the interface for constructing menus
    PopupExtension.PopupMenuFilter
    the function interface for menu filtering
    SearchTextField.SearchedItemsListener
    a listener interface for receiving the searched items
    SearchTextField.SearchTextFieldModel
    the interface for the searching model
    SearchTextField.SearchTextFieldPublisher
    the intermediate items submission target
    SettingsWindow.FileDialogManagerListener
    the callback interface for SettingsWindow.FileDialogManager in order to save and load history of files to preferences
    SettingsWindow.SettingSupport
    the callback interface for SettingsWindow in order to save and load preferences of the window
    SwingDeferredRunner.Task
    a function interface under the event dispatching thread
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ApplicationIconGenerator
    generating an icon image from the name of the app
    ApplicationIconGenerator.NameLinePattern
    a pattern of line wrapping in order to find optimal layout: indices are word indices of lines e.g.
    ApplicationIconGenerator.NameWordBounds
    bounds of words with a graphics context
    EditingRunner
    the sub-class of the executor with implementing various listeners
    KeyUndoManager
    the class provides Undo and Redo actions for text panes.
    KeyUndoManager.DynamicCompoundEdit
    a composition of undoable-edits
    KeyUndoManager.UndoAction
    the action for undo or redo
    LineNumberPane
    a line-numbers display.
    MenuBuilder
    a utility for menu construction.
    MenuBuilder.AddingProcess
    intermediate state for constructing menus
    MenuBuilder.MenuAppender
    an appender of menu-items: supporting JMenu, Action, JPopupMenu, JMenuItem and JComponent
    MenuBuilder.MenuLabel
    a label menu-item component
    NamedPane
    a wrapper pane with a label
    PopupCategorized
    a menu builder for categorizing items.
    PopupCategorized.CategorizedMenuItemActionCheckDelegate
    a check-box menu item version of PopupCategorized.CategorizedMenuItemActionDelegate
    PopupCategorized.CategorizedMenuItemActionDelegate
    an action wraps another action for supplying category info.
    PopupCategorized.CategorizedMenuItemComponentDefault
    the default impl.
    PopupCategorized.CategorizedMenuItemComponentDelegate
    a PopupCategorized.CategorizedMenuItemComponent with custom category and subCategory
    PopupCategorized.CategorizedMenuItemLabelDelegate
    a PopupCategorized.CategorizedMenuItemLabel with custom category and subCategory
    PopupCategorized.PopupCategorizedBuildingItems
    intermediate state for building items
    PopupCategorized.PopupCategorizedFixed
    another menu builder with limiting items
    PopupCategorized.SearchPopupAction
    an action for selecting a PopupCategorized.CategorizedMenuItem
    PopupExtension
    a popup menu manager.
    PopupExtension.DefaultPopupGetter
    a default popup-menu factory creating a new popup and setting it to the component
    PopupExtension.DefaultPopupMenu
    custom popup-menu for fixing display location issue: overriding setLocation
    PopupExtension.MenuKeySelector
    a menu-selector by incremental key-typing
    PopupExtension.PopupCancelChecker
    improve default behavior of showing popup menu: clicking a menu button while the menu is visible can hide it
    PopupExtension.PopupExtensionDisplayAction
    an action for displaying a popup menu
    PopupExtension.PopupMenuBuilderEmpty
    the empty builder
    PopupExtension.PopupMenuFilterAsIs
    a filter for accepting any items as is
    PopupExtension.PopupMenuListenerForSetup
    the menu listener for calling PopupExtension.setupMenu()
    PopupExtension.PredicateKeyMatcher
    keyCode and modifierEx: ALT_DOWN_MASK, ...
    PopupExtensionText
    default popup menu support for text components.
    PopupExtensionText.TextAbstractHistoryAction
    an abstract action for interacting with the history-buffer (kill-buffer)
    PopupExtensionText.TextClearAction
    action for clearing the field
    PopupExtensionText.TextCopyAction
    a copy action
    PopupExtensionText.TextCopyAllAction
    a copy-all action: copying all text in a text-component
    PopupExtensionText.TextCutAction
    a cut action
    PopupExtensionText.TextDeleteNextWordAction
    an delete-next-word action
    PopupExtensionText.TextDeletePreviousWordAction
    an delete-previous-word action
    PopupExtensionText.TextDeleteToLineEndAction
    an delete-to-line-end action
    PopupExtensionText.TextInputEdit
    an edit in the history buffer
    PopupExtensionText.TextInputHistory
    a history buffer (kill buffer)
    PopupExtensionText.TextLoadAction
    a file loading action
    PopupExtensionText.TextOpenBrowserAction
    the action for opening selection as an URL in a browser
    PopupExtensionText.TextPasteAction
    a paste action
    PopupExtensionText.TextPasteAllAction
    a paste-all action: replacing entire text with the clipboard contents
    PopupExtensionText.TextPasteHistoryAction
    an paste the history-buffer action (yank)
    PopupExtensionText.TextSaveAction
    a file saving action
    PopupExtensionText.TextSelectAllAction
    a select-all action
    PopupExtensionText.TextServiceDefaultMenu
    a PopupExtension.PopupMenuBuilder which has typical actions for the text component
    ResizableFlowLayout
    a layout manager for lining up components horizontally or vertically.
    ResizableFlowLayout.LayoutAppender<ContainerType extends Container>
    a class for providing fluent interface for constructing ResizableFlowLayout
    SearchTextField
    a text-field implementation with supporting background searching.
    SearchTextField.DynamicItemAction
    an action for searching, filtering and selecting items
    SearchTextField.SearchBackgroundPainter
    an interface for painting background
    SearchTextField.SearchBackgroundPainterBordered
    the painter impl.
    SearchTextField.SearchTask
    the background searching task
    SearchTextField.SearchTextFieldModelEmpty
    the empty model for searching nothing
    SearchTextField.SearchTextFieldPublisherEmpty
    empty impl.
    SearchTextFieldFilePath
    a text-field with background searching file-items
    SearchTextFieldFilePath.DesktopOpenAction
    the action for opening files
    SearchTextFieldFilePath.DesktopRevealAction
    the action for showing files in Finder or Explorer
    SearchTextFieldFilePath.FileClearAction
    action for clearing the field
    SearchTextFieldFilePath.FileCopyAllAction
    copying the selected file
    SearchTextFieldFilePath.FileInfoItem
    a file info item
    SearchTextFieldFilePath.FileItem
    a completed file item
    SearchTextFieldFilePath.FileItemWithKey

    an abstract definition of a file-list
    SearchTextFieldFilePath.FileListEditAction
    the action for completing a searched file-item
    SearchTextFieldFilePath.FilePasteAction
    the action for text paste
    SearchTextFieldFilePath.FileSelection
    transferable object for a file list
    SearchTextFieldFilePath.FileTransferHandler
    a transfer-handler for copying and pasting a file-list
    SearchTextFieldFilePath.IconWrapper  
    SearchTextFieldFilePath.OpenDialogAction
    an action for selecting a file item from an open dialog
    SearchTextFieldFilePath.SearchTextFieldModelFilePath
    the model definition for the completing file items
    SettingsWindow
    a shared window manager for the setting panel.
    SettingsWindow.ColorButton
    a color well can be changed by a shared color-panel
    SettingsWindow.ColorWindow
    a window holder for the color chooser used by SettingsWindow.ColorButton.
    SettingsWindow.FileBackAction
    an action for changing the selected directory of SettingsWindow.FileDialogManager
    SettingsWindow.FileDialogManager
    a shared dialog, can be obtained by SettingsWindow.getFileDialogManager().
    SettingsWindow.FileItemRenderer
    a list renderer for history of files of SettingsWindow.FileDialogManager
    SettingsWindow.FileListAddAction
    an action for adding the selected file to history of files of SettingsWindow.FileDialogManager
    SettingsWindow.FileListClearAction
    an action for clearing history of files of SettingsWindow.FileDialogManager
    SettingsWindow.FileListModel
    a list-model for history files of SettingsWindow.FileDialogManager
    SettingsWindow.FileListRemoveAction
    an action for removing an item in history of files of SettingsWindow.FileDialogManager
    SettingsWindow.LabelGroup
    a group of labels
    SettingsWindow.SettingsFrame  
    SwingDeferredRunner
    a task runner in the event dispatching thread without blocking
    SwingDeferredRunner.TaskResultError
    a result for a thrown exception: SwingDeferredRunner.TaskResultFuture return the value if the task failed with an exception
    SwingDeferredRunner.TaskResultFuture
    a incomplete result
    TableRowHeightFitter
    customizing table-rows based on their minimum-size.
    TableRowHeightFitter.RowHeightUpdate  
    TableRowHeightFitter.TableColumnWidthChangeListener

    ToolBarHiddenMenu
